actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A Bill to designate the River of No Return Wilderness, Bitterroot, Boise, Challis, Nez Perce, Payette, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho.

summary.text: Designates the areas classified as the Idaho and Salmon River Breaks Primitive Areas as the River of No Return Wilderness in accordance with the Wilderness Act.

titles.title: A Bill to designate the River of No Return Wilderness, Bitterroot, Boise, Challis, Nez Perce, Payette, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho.
